titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter sent from the Kings army to a gentleman of worth and qualitie in Suffolk: shewing the present condition of the Kings army, intercepted August 28. by the scouts at Cambridge, and by them brought to the committee. Published by order.
titleStmt.author: Crofts, John, 1612 or 13-1670.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
